DOC.brief_title: Study Of Oral PHA-848125AC In Patients With Malignant Thymoma Previously Treated With Multiple Lines Of Chemotherapy
DOC.detailed_description: This single-arm , open-label , multicenter , phase II clinical trial design early stopping rule . PHA-848125AC administered patient recurrent metastatic unresectable B3 thymoma thymic carcinoma receive one line prior systemic therapy advance / metastatic disease . The intent study assess antitumor activity PHA-848125AC ultimately improve outcome patient . The primary end point study progression free survival rate 3 month .
